nodes.description: 克罗地亚国防军（HVO）在波黑战争末期逮捕并引渡至埃及的Talaat Fouad Qasim，其系al-Gama'a al-Islamiyya重要成员
nodes.support_text: In the last days of the Bosnian War, the Croatian Defense Council (HVO)...Croatia. Because of that and because Croatia had de facto controlled the Croatian Defence Council...

nodes.description: 克罗地亚因控制HVO并协助引渡Qasim，决定实施恐怖袭击
nodes.support_text: Because of that and because Croatia had de facto controlled the Croatian Defence Council...a decision was made to commit a terrorist attack in Croatia.

nodes.description: 1995年10月20日11:21 CEPT，载有TNT的Fiat 131 Mirafiori冲撞里耶卡警察局停车场墙壁
nodes.support_text: At 11:21 a.m. Central European Time, a Fiat 131 Mirafiori entered the parking lot...the wall at the end of the parking lot.

nodes.description: 车辆因倒车困难加速冲撞警察局楼梯，11:22当地时间（10:22 UTC）爆炸
nodes.support_text: Due to the 90-degree turn needed to enter the lot, the vehicle moved slowly...the stairs leading to the police station and exploded.

nodes.description: 警方调查发现车体含高爆炸药TNT，并提取加拿大护照残片
nodes.support_text: The police investigation found out the car was loaded with highly-explosive TNT. The police also found a part of a Canadian passport inside the remains...

nodes.description: al-Gama'a al-Islamiyya次日宣称对袭击负责，要求引渡Qasim
nodes.support_text: The next day, representatives of the al-Gama'a al-Islamiyya terrorist organization...requesting extradition of Qasim.

nodes.description: 袭击未造成其他死亡，因车辆动力不足未能摧毁警察局墙体
nodes.support_text: The other apparent miscalculation involved the size of the parking lot...only 29 injuries were recorded (including two unaware bystanders).

nodes.description: 爆炸导致地面形成大型坑洞，损毁周边建筑及车辆
nodes.support_text: The bomb also carved a large crater in the ground, battering nearby buildings and destroying vehicles.

nodes.description: 美克联合调查确认Hassan al-Sharif Mahmud Saad为袭击策划者，其此前在意大利居住
nodes.support_text: With the help of the CIA, officials examined the video footage...Hassan al-Sharif Mahmud Saad had organized this attack.

nodes.description: Saad计划12月对北约发动袭击，但袭击未遂后3天在波黑被克罗地亚国防军击毙
nodes.support_text: Saad was planning a new terrorist attack...he was killed in central Bosnia in a firefight with Croatian Defense Council forces.

edges.support_text: Because of that and because Croatia had de facto controlled the Croatian Defence Council...a decision was made to commit a terrorist attack in Croatia.

Saad在波黑被击毙前曾居住于该地区
